titleStmt.title: A true and full account of a conference held about religion, between Dr. Tenison and A. Pulton one of the masters in the Savoy Published by authority.
True and full account of a conference held about religion, between Dr. Tho. Tenison and A. Pulton one of the masters in the Savoy.
titleStmt.author: Pulton, A. (Andrew), 1654-1710.
Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Nathaniel Thompson at the entrance into Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross,

notesStmt.note: The version as given by Pulton.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: A true and full relation of the late conference between Dr. T. & A.P. one of the masters of the Savoy.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of the edition with "Dr. Tho. Tenison" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the entrance into Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross
